Package terrain

Class TerrainManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • terrain.TerrainManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class TerrainManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Class responsible for regenerating the terrain detail based on camera position. Runs in separete thread, when needed generates the vertices to update terrain and initiates swap.
    Author:
    smid
